actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill for the relief of certain Federal employees killed or injured in the collapse of a building.

summary.text: Relieves any Federal employee killed or injured in the collapse of a Government-leased building in Florida (or any person acting on his or her behalf) from liability to refund to the United States any compensation benefit paid to such person in connection with any suit or settlement arising out of such death or injury.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of certain Federal employees killed or injured in the collapse of a building.
